name: Cyberbots
description:
Cyberbots

This game was made as final project for our Game Design course at UniRitter College & university late 2022.

The game is based on a famous robot combat TV show, where you can battle against your friend (local multiplayer available only).

Assemble and customize your robots then jump into the arena to battle until one got destroyed! or when the timer runs out..

* Controls explained in-game.

The Team

Leonardo Saraiva – 3D Modelling

Gabriel Pedroso – 3D Modelling & Level Design

Thiago Araújo – Programming

Textures Source: textures.com
